title: Privacy Policy
content:
Protecting your private information is our priority. This Statement of Privacy applies to the Vivoh OnTime App (“the App”) and Vivoh, Inc. and governs data collection and usage. For the purposes of this Privacy Policy, unless otherwise noted, all references to Vivoh, Inc. include the App and Vivoh. The Vivoh app is a Streaming Media native application. By using the Vivoh App, you consent to the data practices described in this statement.

Collection of your Personal Information

Please keep in mind that if you directly disclose personally identifiable information or personally sensitive data through Vivoh’s App, this information may be collected and used by others.

We do not collect any personal information about you unless you voluntarily provide it to us. However, you may be required to provide certain personal information to us when you elect to use certain features or services available in the App. These may include: (a) registering for an account; (b) entering data; (c) signing in to an embedded service; (d) sending us an email message; (e) submitting a support request. To wit, we will use your information for, but not limited to, communicating with you in relation to services and/or products you have requested from us. We also may gather additional personal or non-personal information in the future.

Sharing Information with Third Parties

Vivoh does not sell, rent or lease its customer lists to third parties.

Vivoh may share data with trusted partners to help perform statistical analysis All such third parties are prohibited from using your personal information except to provide these services to Vivoh, and they are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information.

Vivoh may disclose your personal information, without notice, if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to: (a) conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process served by Vivoh or the App; (b) protect and defend the rights or property of Vivoh; and/or (c) act under exigent circumstances to protect the personal safety of users of the App, or the public.

Tracking User Behavior

Vivoh may keep track of the users’s interactions with the App, in order to determine how Vivoh services are performing. This data is used to deliver quality services to Vivoh customers.

Automatically Collected Information

Information about your computer hardware and software may be automatically collected by Vivoh. This information can include: your IP address, browser type, domain names, access times and referring website addresses. This information is used for the operation of the service, to maintain quality of the service, and to provide general statistics regarding use of the Vivoh App.

Links

This App contains links to other sites. Please be aware that we are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of such other sites. We encourage our users to be aware when they leave our App and to read the privacy statements of any other site or services that collects personally identifiable information.

Security of your Personal Information

Vivoh secures your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. Vivoh uses the following methods for this purpose: SSL encryption, encryption at rest .

We strive to take appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access to or alteration of your personal information. Unfortunately, no data transmission over the Internet or any wireless network can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. As a result, while we strive to protect your personal information, you acknowledge that: (a) there are security and privacy limitations inherent to the Internet which are beyond our control; and (b) security, integrity, and privacy of any and all information and data exchanged between you and us through this App cannot be guaranteed.


Changes to this Statement

Vivoh reserves the right to change this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you about significant changes in the way we treat personal information by sending a notice to the primary email address specified in your account, by placing a prominent notice on our site, and/or by updating any privacy information on this page. Your continued use of the Site and/or Services available through this Site after such modifications will constitute your: (a) acknowledgment of the modified Privacy Policy; and (b) agreement to abide and be bound by that Policy.

Contact Information

Vivoh welcomes your questions or comments regarding this Statement of Privacy. If you believe that Vivoh has not adhered to this Statement, please contact Vivoh at:

Vivoh, Inc.
685 New Britain Ave, Farmington, CT 06032

Email Address: sales@vivoh.com
Telephone number: (860) 606-7878

Effective as of February 01, 2022
